mapper.select: select co.id batchNo, goods.name goodsName, sum((sch.after_count-sch.before_count)) subCount from inno72_supply_channel_order co left join inno72_supply_channel_history sch on co.id=sch.batch_no inner join inno72_goods goods on sch.goods_id=goods.id where co.user_id=#{checkUserId} and co.machine_id=#{machineId} and sch.after_count != sch.before_count and DATE_FORMAT(co.create_time,'%Y%M%D') = DATE_FORMAT(#{findTime},'%Y%M%D') group by co.id,goods.id order by co.create_time
